name: enemy basic attack
note:
<Custom Target Eval>
const rowcheck = [];
  for (var i = 0; i < foes.aliveMembers().length; ++i) {
    var member = foes.aliveMembers()[i];
    if (member.row() === 1) rowcheck.push(member);
  }
targets.push(rowcheck[Math.floor(Math.random() * rowcheck.length)])
  </Custom Target Eval>

name: Guard
note:
Skill #2 will be used when you select
the Guard command.

description:
Attempt to snatch something from an enemy.
Success chance goes up with enemy distraction.
name: Steal
move
note:
<Custom User Row>
if (row > 1) {
row = 1;
} else {
row = 2;
}
</Custom User Row>

name: Escape
note:
<After Eval>
  if(user._hidden){ //success
     GameHam.displayBattleText(user._name + " got away!", 50);
  } else { // failed escape
     GameHam.displayBattleText(user._name + " failed to escape!", 30);
  }
</After Eval>

description:
Reveal an enemy's info and items that you
couldn't normally steal. Must be \I[11] Landed.
name: Scan

description:
Drop a bomb, raises Distraction and may inflict
Berserk. Must be \I[10] Flying.
name: Drop Payload

description:
Removes buffs and adds random statuses to
all enemies. Must be \I[10] Flying.
name: Chemtrail

description:
Electircal surge hurting the user and frightens
target. Must be \I[11] Landed.
name: Assault & Batteries

description:
Crash down, scaring and distracting all enemies
and hurting yourself in the process. \I[10]
name: Crash Landing!

description:
Your sweet song draws everyone's attention.
 Must be \I[11] Landed.
name: COME HITHER

description:
Your hatred and hunger for battle grant everyone
random bonuses.
name: WAR GOD'S BLESSING

description:
Take hits for the allies \I[[10] above you and 
grant them 15 Hatred. Must be \I[11] Landed.
name: CHAMPION HATRED
note:
<Row Only: 1>
<Target: Ally Row 2>
<After Eval>
   user.addState(19);
</After Eval>

description:
Descend to distract and frighten the enemy.
Must be \I[10] Flying, ends \I[11] Landed.
name: BATTLE CHARGE

description: Fascinate an enemy, making them attack their own.
name: DANCE FOR ME

description:
Commit murder most fowl.
Works on everything always.
name: Murder

description: Blind an enemy, lowering their accuracy.
message1: brings down a veil of ultimate darkness!
name: Curse of Darkness

description: Silence an enemy, preventing many abilities.
name: Nevermore

description:
Frighten an enemy, with a chance to cut down
their defenses. Must be \I[11] Landed.
name: Sharpen Knife

description:
Become too cool to care! Remove all debuffs from 
yourself and gain immunity to them for 3 turns.
name: Tch.

description:
Frighten all enemies, and then high-tail it
out of battle. Must be \I[11] Landed.
name: Retch & Run

description:
Take a bite out of an enemy, inflicting fear
and restoring some hunger. Must be \I[11] Landed.
name: Gorge

description:
Begin circling an enemy, causing them fear
every turn for 3 turns. Must be \I[10] Flying.
name: Demonic Circle

description: The next hit to this bird will deal 1 damage.
name: Desert Mirage

description: Raise the thievery of all birds.
message2: You have nothing to lose but your chains!
name: Do Crime

description:
Descend toward the enemy and frighten them.
 Must be \I[10] Flying, ends \I[11] Landed.
name: Divebomb

description:
Take flight, distracting all enemies.
 Must be \I[11] Landed, ends \I[10] Flying.
name: Takeoff

description:
Let allies in the \I[10] sky fly behind you for
a speed boost. Must be \I[11] Landed.
name: Tailwind

description: Raise an enemy's Fear by half of their Distraction.
name: Wakeup Call

description:
Distract all enemies and make your next turn 
come sooner. Must be \I[10] Flying.
name: Stunt Flier

description:
Insure yourself and gain Shiny when you're hit
for the next 3 turns.
message1: took out a life insurance policy!
name: Insurance Policy

description:
Pay the enemy 10 Shiny to look the other way,
raising their Distraction.
name: Bribery
note:
<Custom Requirement>
   if ($gameParty.gold() > 10) {
     value = true;
   } else {
     value = false;
   }
</Custom Requirement>

<Custom Execution>
   $gameParty.loseGold(10);
</Custom Execution>

description: Spend 20 Shiny to buy a random item.
name: Purchase
note:
<Custom Requirement>
   if ($gameParty.gold() > 20) {
     value = true;
   } else {
     value = false;
   }
</Custom Requirement>

<Custom Execution>
   $gameParty.loseGold(20);
</Custom Execution>

<Post-Damage Eval>
   $gameTemp.reserveCommonEvent(2);
</Post-Damage Eval>

description:
These other birds haven't even noticed that wallet.
You bet you could swipe it.
name: White Collar Crime

description:
Pay 100 Shiny to have your hired goons eliminate
an enemy.
name: Take to the Cleaners
note:
<Custom Requirement>
   if ($gameParty.gold() > 100) {
     value = true;
   } else {
     value = false;
   }
</Custom Requirement>

<Custom Execution>
   $gameParty.loseGold(100);
</Custom Execution>

name: Insurance Counter
note:
<Counter Condition>
physical hit
</Counter Condition>

<Custom Execution>
  var newDosh;
  if(user._hp >= 75){
    newDosh = 5;
  } else if(user._hp >=25 && user._hp < 75){
    newDosh = 15;
  } else {newDosh = 25;
  }
  var text = "" + user._name + " collected on their life insurance \npolicy! They gained " + newDosh + " Shinies!";
  $gameParty.gainGold(newDosh);
  $gameMessage.add(text);
</Custom Execution>

description: Frighten an enemy.
name: Attack

description: Go wild, frightening two enemies at random.
name: Double Attack

description: Gain 20 Hatred.
message1: makes up a guy to get mad at!
name: Strawman

description:
Breathe fire, dealing damage based on
your metabolism.
name: Firaga

description:
Spend all your Hatred and some of your Health, 
and cause an enemy fear based on your Hatred.
name: Explosive Fury
note:
<Custom HP Cost>
cost += Math.floor((user.tp) * .4);
</Custom HP Cost>

<Post-Damage Eval>
user.clearTp();
</Post-Damage Eval>

name: ice to meet you
note:
<Post-Damage Eval>
if (target.isActor() && target.isStateAffected(36)) {
  if (!target.isLearnedSkill(123)) {
    target.learnSkill(123);
    var text = target.name() + ' has learned '
    text = text + ($dataSkills[123]).name + '\nwith their horrid ways!';
    $gameMessage.add(text);
  }
}
</Post-Damage Eval>

description:
Distract and slow your enemies with your lovely treats!
 Must be \I[10] Flying.
name: ~Lovely Treat~

description:
Bounce to lower your enemies' aggression.
 Must be \I[11] Landed, ends \I[10] Flying.
name: ~Bouncy Birdy~

description:
Protect everyone in the flock from the next attack!
 Must be \I[10] Flying.
name: ~Snow Day!~

description:
Chatter incessantly, distracting your opponent for 3 
turns. May cause rage. Must be \I[11] Grounded.
message1: starts babbling in the dreaded human tongue!
name: ~Bird Word~

description:
Put on a light show to hurt and scare everyone on the 
battlefield randomly! Must be \I[10] Flying.
message1: 's feathers begin reflecting the sun's rays!
name: ~Glow Bird~

description:
Reign fear from above with backup from your armada!
 Must be \I[10] Flying.
name: ~Normal Frequencies~

description:
Shoot a sonic blast to knock your enemies off guard!
 Must be \I[11] Landed.
name: ~Bird Shot~

description: Prepare your allies for war with random buffs!
name: ~Clear Purpose~

hit you with the right moves!
name: Clever Bird!
